## parse variable

解析 URL 字符串并返回一个包含各个部分的对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
parse: (url?: string) => {
    getProtocol(): string;
    getHost(): string;
    getPort(): string;
    getPath(): string;
    getHash(): {
        route: string;
        param: Record<string, string>;
    };
    getQuery(key: string): string | Record<string, string>;
}
```
